Q.1. Premlata went 8 km in the east from her home & then she turned to the left & went 6 km. Finally, she turned to the left & went 8 km how far was she from the starting point & in which direction?
Q.2. Ram goes 4 km in the South & then goes 5 km after turning to the left & then goes 4 km after turning to the left. Now from this point; how far is his starting point & in which direction?
Q.3. If it was Wednesday on 2 March, the then which day would come on 26 March ?
Q.4. 2 days before the yesterday, it was Tuesday, then which would be the day on the day after 2 days from tomorrow ?
Q.5. it is 4 hrs. 40 min. in a clock. Find the angle between both the needles of a clock.
Q.6. In a code language, PAWAN is written as QBXBO, then how JAMUN will be written in the same language?
Q.7. How many digits in 284371 are such digit which are ate the same distance from the starting when they will be arranged in the descending order?
(A) None (B) One (C) Two (D) None of these
Q.8. Position of Sita from left is 18th and from right is 30th. Then how many people are in a queue?

Q.9. Who is exactly at left of S?
Q.10. Who is second to right of T?
Q.11. In which of the following pairs first person sits exactly at right of second person ?
Q.12. What is the exact position of W?
(A) Just left is the second of V
Q.13. Who is second at right of S?

(D) Any two out of three are possible
(E) It is not possible with the condition on the day after day

Direction (21-25): - S, R, N, L, M, T, O, & P are eight persons sitting in a circle facing the center. Their different occupations are-reporter, doctor, cricketer, teacher, accountant, shopkeeper, painter & Supervisor, but not necessarily in the same order as given.
Q.21. Who form the following is a reporter?
Q.22.What is the position of S regarding R?
Q.23. If we count in the anti-clockwise direction starting from N; then how many persons are sitting between P & N?
Q.24. As pe the position mentioned above; four of the following pairs are alike & so they form their group. Which one does not belong to this group?
Q.25. Which of the following statement is false regarding the above-mentioned arrangement?
(A) N is at the immediate right of supervisor.
(B) Cricketer is third to the right of shopkeeper.
(C) Doctor is sitting exactly between supervisor & accountant
(D) L is neither a teacher nor a supervisor.
(E) Only three persons are between S & N.
